scope_completed.swarm_onboarding: Agent-5 successfully onboarded to swarm coordination system via S2A directive
scope_completed.workspace_initialization: Created agent workspace structure with status.json and inbox processing
scope_completed.fsm_activation: Set FSM state to ACTIVE with proper cycle counting and task tracking

decisions_made.onboarding_approach: Soft onboarding with immediate activation vs phased introduction
decisions_made.workspace_isolation: Local agent workspaces excluded from git vs centralized coordination
decisions_made.status_tracking: JSON-based status with FSM states vs database tracking
decisions_made.task_claiming: CLI-based task claiming from contract system vs direct assignment

tradeoffs.immediate_activation: Fast swarm integration vs gradual capability building
tradeoffs.local_workspace: Agent autonomy vs centralized coordination visibility
tradeoffs.json_status: Simple file-based tracking vs complex database schema
tradeoffs.cli_task_claiming: Direct command execution vs GUI workflow management

cold_start_handoff.current_state: Agent-5 fully onboarded and ready for task execution in swarm system
cold_start_handoff.entry_points: python -m src.services.messaging_cli --agent Agent-5 --get-next-task for task claiming
cold_start_handoff.configuration: Agent workspace at agent_workspaces/Agent-5/ with status.json and inbox/
cold_start_handoff.coordination: Check swarm brain patterns and review other agent status.json files
cold_start_handoff.boundaries: Modify only agent_workspaces/Agent-5/** - escalate for cross-agent changes
